alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tipton and northeastern Shelby Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Munford, or 10 miles south of Fort Pillow State Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Millington, Lakeland, Arlington, Munford, Brighton, Dixonville, Tipton, Atoka, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Barretville, Egypt, Quito, Redwood, Rosemark, Idaville, Beaver, Randolph and Brunswick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
